scripts.start-rebuild: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.package: npm run build && node ./node_modules/electron-packager/cli.js --overwrite --ignore app --ignore webpack.config.js --ignore standalone-app.iml --ignore pom.xml --ignore README.md .
scripts.package-win32: npm run build && node ./node_modules/electron-packager/cli.js --overwrite --platform win32 --ignore app --ignore webpack.config.js --ignore standalone-app.iml --ignore pom.xml --ignore README.md .
scripts.mvn-electron-win32: ./node/node ./node_modules/electron-packager/cli.js --overwrite --platform win32 --ignore app --ignore webpack.config.js --ignore standalone-app.iml --ignore pom.xml --ignore README.md .
